#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;/*
#define gc getchar_unlocked()
long long int in()
{
 char c;
 long long int t=0;
 c=gc;
 while(c<48||c>57)
 c=gc;
 while(c>=48&&c<=57)
 {
 t=(t<<1)+(t<<3)+c-48;
 c=gc;
 }
 return t;
}
*/
int main()
{
 int t;
 scanf("%d",&t);
// t=in();
 while(t--)
 {
  int n,k,ans=0;
  scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
  //n=in();
  //k=in();
  char s[n+10];
  scanf("%s",&s);
  int a[n],l=0;
  memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
  int count=0,x=strlen(s);
  for(int i=0;i<x;++i)
  {
           count++;
           if(s[i]!=s[i+1])
           {
                 a[l++]=count;
                 count=0;          
           }
  }       int f=0;   
  for(int i=0;i<l;++i)
  {
   if(a[i]<k)
   ans++;  
   else
   {f=1;
    if(a[i]%k==0)
    ans+=(a[i]/k);  
    else
    ans+=(a[i]/k)+1;  
   }      
  }
  if(f==0)
  cout<<"-1\n";
  else
  cout<<ans<<endl;
 }
 return 0;    
}
